publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2142.1 Joe FitzPatrick: Train Transportâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2142) in the name of Des McNulty, insert at end "while noting that the minister responsible for this franchise is Parliamentary Under Secretary of State for Transport, Tom Harris MP."
